subject: Atlantic Yards (Brooklyn)
Basketball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Russian billionaire, has navigated the N.B.A.’s background examination. He will, however, undergo further scrutiny until an owners’ vote in February.
snippet: Mikhail D. Prokhorov, the Russian billionaire, has navigated the N.B.A.’s background examination. He will, however, undergo further scrutiny until an owners’ vote in February.
